reviews.review:
Portal 2 is one of my favorite games of all time. I adore every character and every voice, every level and every hidden secret, every moment and every memory. I played it as a kid on my PS3 several times through and only now can I recognize its brilliance in game design (and play it with friends, which is a spectacular cooperative experience if you enjoy being pat on the back for showing your friends why trust isn't in your vocabulary). This game lands itself upon a very small list of games I would hand to absolutely everyone.

Portal 2 is a must-play. 9/10.
God I hate myself so much and just want to die. Um but yeah the game is uh pretty good so. definitly worth the money.

мама
Really fun.

Only negative thing I can say about this game is that there isnt a third one. Everything about this game is good. Well thought out puzzles and game mechanics. Brilliant story that compliments the first game nicely while expanding on it in a much greater way. Great art design, I really was struck by broken down and ruined apature was, you really get the feeling that it hadnt been touched for a long long time. Amazing music that changes as you interact with different mechanics in the test chambers. Brilliant dialogue that had me laughing out loud many many times. This game makes you feel emotional many times. Youll go from afraid, to happy, to laughing, to angry, to sad, to downright depressed once its all over. I love this game!
Ein sehr gutes spiel mit einer guten story. ich kann es nur empfehlen.
This is a very interesting and complicated game. Everybody shoud try it out!

рецепт шаурмы

Ингредиенты: Лаваш – 3 штуки. Грибы шампиньоны – 200 грамм. Куриное филе – 200 грамм. Корнишоны – 100 грамм. Твердый сыр – 150 грамм. Капуста белокочанная – 200 грамм. Морковь – 100 грамм. Огурец – 1 штука. Майонез – 100 грамм. Кетчуп – 100 грамм. Специя хмели-сунели – по вкусу. Способ приготовления: Филе курицы отварить, нарезать кусочками. Грибы промыть, нарезать, пожарить на сковороде до готовности. Смешать кетчуп и майонез до однородности. Сыр натереть на мелкой терке. Капусту мелко нашинковать, огурец нарезать пластинками. Корнишоны нарезать кубиками. Лаваш смазать соусом, выложить начинку слоями: мясо, капуста, морковь, огурцы, корнишоны. Смазать начинку соусом, посыпать специей и тертым сыром. Завернуть лаваш в шаурму, выложить ее на противень, готовить в духовке 3 – 5 минут.

Tam anlamı ile muhteşem bir oyun...

Serinin 1. oyunundan farkı yok gibi gözükse de, oyunu alınca büyük değişiklikleri fark edebiliyorsunuz.Siz seviye seviye parkur yaptığınızı sanıyorken bir anda oyunun içinde kendinizi teknoloji ile yüzleşirken buluyorsunuz.Yüksek strateji ve düşünmeye dayalı bir oyun .Silah bıçak gibi vurdulu kırdılı aletlere yer verilmese de aksiyondan geri kalınmamış.Oyunun içinde ufak tefek yerlerde gizli odalara açılan yerler var .Buna Youtube'dan ulaşabilirsiniz.

İndirimlerde aldım , keşke bu oyunu indirimleri beklemeden alsaymışım öyle söyleyeyim :) , vakit kaybetmeden alın ve oynayın...
